assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Latrice Landry, J.Scott Roberts, Daiva Elena Nielsen and Deanna Alexis Carere declare they have not conflict of interests.Dr. Green receives compensation for speaking or consultation from AIA, GenePeeks, Helix, Illumina, Prudential and Veritas, and is co-founder and advisor to Genome Medical, Inc.All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000. Informed consent was obtained from all participants included in the study.
